entry.title: Analyzing Availability in the Display Product Availability App
entry.content:
In the previous blog that introduced the Display Product Availability, we talked about providing you with the capability to dive deep into how a product’s availability is determined. That plan has been realized, and the Analyze Product Availability feature is here! 

When you view the availability of products in the Display Product Availability app, you can now go to a specific plant and view details, such as the supply and demand elements (referred to as MRP elements) that affect the product’s availability.  

You can also explore further and see how the scope of availability check is configured for the product. The scope of check also tells you the check horizon setting, which helps you understand the calculation of the confirmed quantity of a product.  

Let’s go through the features one by one. 

See MRP elements and other details

To get started with analyzing product availability, in the Display Product Availability app, choose a specific Plant where you want to examine the availability situation. 

For that Plant, you will find details of the availability situation. You can use this information to:  

  • Understand the confirmations of requirements. For example, you can see why you have certain available quantities on a given date, or be aware of a concurrent demand that consumes the stock or receipt quantity. 
  • Analyze the availability situation so that you can reliably respond to customer demands or share internally with other stakeholders.

There are several actions you can carry out: 

  • Drill down on each MRP element to see which document contributes to the availability situation. 
  • Hover over the Available Quantity — You’ll find the total receipts and requirements, and the quantity that is reserved for future requirements. The reserved quantity considers protected quantity reserved for prioritized customers if supply protection is included in the scope of check. For information about supply protection, see Supply Protection (SUP). 
  • Adjust the date range in the Receipts and Requirements table to find out the planned changes in availability. 
  • Examine the scope of check. 

Show scope of check

You can choose „Show Scope of Check“ to see which stocks, receipts, requirements, and other MRP elements are considered for the availability check. For example, if supply protection is included (With Supply Protection for Specific Document Types under Special Scenarios is checked) in the scope of check, then the protected quantity will be included in calculating the product’s availability. 

The scope of check is based on the checking group assigned to the product in the material master, and the checking rule. The checking rule is based on the availability context (sales, or delivery) you selected in combination with the special stock type, if selected. 

You can expand Result After Check Horizon to know the check horizon settings in the material master for this plant. Depending on the settings here, demands and receipts after the check horizon may or may not be considered in the Available-To-Promise check.  

If the Result After Check Horizon is set to Full Confirmation, then the requirements after the check horizon are confirmed fully. Once they move inside the check horizon, the requirements immediately reserve quantity. If the setting is Zero Confirmation, then the requirements after the check horizon are not confirmed; they remain backordered. If Ignore Check Horizon is checked, then requirements are confirmed according to the available stocks and supply elements. These settings explain why the available quantity can be negative, zero, or unlimited, other than positive.  

By offering greater transparency into the factors that impact product availability, you can better track your products’ availability. 

Link to product assistance: Analyzing Product Availability

entry.title: The SAP Extended Warehouse Management FAQ Series: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Integration
entry.content:
Many customers running standardized processes for their Finance, Controlling and Order Management processes in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud are searching for options to integrate advanced warehouse management functionalities to cover their logistics process requirements and help them to grow their business.

With SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 a new scope item enabling integration of SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud with EWM for SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud will be available, to combine standardized cloud ERP processes to be integrated with advanced warehouse management capabilities.

With this blog post are discussing questions and interesting information around the integration of SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and EWM for SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud.

Which release is required to setup the SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and EWM for SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud integration?

With SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 a new scope item will be shipped - SAP EWM for SAP S/4HANA Integration (7L1). This includes the new communication scenario Logistics - S/4HANA Extended Warehouse Management Integration (SAP_COM_0A58) that enables the integration of transactional data to a decentral EWM for SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud or OnPremise.

Minimum required SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud release is 2023, FPS0 if batch master data distribution is not required. Otherwise, SAP S/4HANA Private Cloude release 2023, FPS3, introducing the batch master data distribution via DRF is the required minimum release.

Which functional scope is supported in the integration?

The following processes are supported in the SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud integration to a decentral EWM for SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud:

Process

see also Scope Item

Inbound processing from supplier

2VJ - SAP EWM Integration - Inbound Processing from Supplier

Outbound processing to customer

2VK - SAP EWM Integration - Outbound Processing to Customer

Delivery based production integration: Production supply and goods receipt

2VM - SAP EWM Integration - Delivery-Based Production Integration

Customer returns

2VO - SAP EWM Integration - Customer Returns 

Batch management - Creating batches in: 

•       SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition ERP system

•       SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition EWM system

2VN - SAP EWM Integration - Batch Management

Stock transport orders

2VL - SAP EWM Integration - Stock Transport Orders 

What do I have to know about the technical setup of the integration?

To setup the integration there are cut-over, customizing and integration settings required to establish the integration from SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud to SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud via SAP Cloud Connector and vice versa via WebSocket. Please find detailed information about the integration via official Set-Up Instruction - Setting Up SAP EWM for SAP S/4HANA Integration (7L1).

Which deployment scenarios are supported?

We are supporting the integration of a single SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud tenant (with or without Cloud WM) to a single EWM for SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud instance. Additionally, a further SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud instance can be integration to the same EWM for SAP S/4HANA.

Please note that the SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud instance can only be used as a decentral EWM logistics system as the integration of multiple SAP S/4HANA or SAP ECC systems to EWM on SAP S/4HANA embedded not supported (see also SAP Note 3376453 - SAP S/4HANA 2023 FPS00, FPS01, FPS02 and FPS03: Release information and restrictions for EWM in SAP S/4HANA).

Are there any restriction to be considered implementing this integration to EWM for SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud?

There are functional restrictions for EWM on SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud integrating with SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud to be considered. These can be distinguished by supported processes and integration capabilities managed via Control Parameters for ERP Version Control.

Please find a list of most important processes and functions not supported in the integration in the table below:

Process/Functions

Details

Handling Unit Management in EWM in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition

Handling Units can only be managed within SAP EWM. They are not integrated into SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition. Handling Units created in EWM for SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud are not transferred to deliveries in the SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition.

Serial Numbers on warehouse level

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition offers Serial Numbers on the document level (A), the warehouse level (B) and the stock level (C). SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition only offers Serial Numbers on the (A) document and (C) stock levels.​ Serial Number on document and stock level supported for integration scenario only.

Transport Integration – Shipment (LE-TRA) – Transportation Unit

Integration of Transportation Units via SHPMNT05-Idoc to LE-TRA component (Shipments) is not supported in SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud integration.

Integration with SAP Transportation Management (TM)

The integration with Transportation Management (e.g. Via Transportation Units or Advanced Shipping and Receiving) is not supported.

Find a complete list of restrictions and learn more about the new integration between SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and EWM for SAP S/4HANA Private Cloud via SAP Note 3629180 - Supported Processes for EWM Integration with SAP_COM_0A58 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 and Higher.

Learn more about this integration via SAP Help - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 - Feature Scope Description.

entry.title: Intercompany Stock Transfer (1P9) in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
entry.content:
This blog post takes an in-depth look at the classic SAP intercompany stock transfer (as opposed to the Advanced Inter-Company Transfer). We try to offer a comprehensive setup guide, testing procedures, and more details during implementation and adoption. If you’re interested in this business process—or have questions—feel free to leave a comment and discuss!

The features covered in this article are based on SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition 2508, please refer to the latest information for changes in subsequent versions.

 

Index

Intercompany Stock Transfer process overview

Business Process Configuration

Business Partner Master Data Configuration

Product Master Data Configuration

Issues worth discussion

 

Intercompany Stock Transfer process overview

A cross-company code stock transfer process is executed using a normal purchase order with document type NB and item category Empty in the receiving plant. A vendor master record must be created for the supplying plant, specifying its relationship with the plant.

While an intra-company stock transfer order use document type UB with item category U. Just enter the plant in supplier field, no need to create vendor master record for the supplying plant.

Create Intercompany Stock Transfer Order

APP: Create Purchase Order - Advanced (ME21N)

A stock transport order is created for the receiving plant 1320 (Belong to company code 1320) in the item level.  Business Partner PL1311BP in the header represents supplying Plant 1311 (Belong to Company code 1310). The system then recognizes that you are creating a stock transport order when the supplier entered matches a plant in another company code. Then, in the background, the shipping information is determined based on master data and configuration settings.

After clicking Save, purchase order 4500000627 created.

Create Replenishment Delivery for Stock Transfer Order

App My Purchase Orders - Due for Delivery (VL10B)

The replenishment delivery is created for the appropriate shipping point using the My Purchase Orders Due for Deliveryapp, where the stock transport order number can act as a selection criteria.

Open the app, enter a shipping point, and a due date (optional). The system selects stock transport orders due for delivery. The ship-to party is determined from the configuration: the receiving plant is assigned a business partner master record that represents the ship-to party.

You can flag the orders that you want to work on and choose Background. The system then creates replenishment deliveries for these orders in the background.

A green light on indicating outbound delivery successfully created. Double click on the Originating Doc 4500000627 to show the outbound delivery ID 80000283 under Purchase Order History tab.

The delivery type to be used for the replenishment delivery is also determined automatically based on configuration settings: it is defined for the combination of order document type NB and the issuing plant used. The default delivery type for an outbound delivery for a cross company-code stock transport order is delivery type NLCC (Replen.Cross­Company).

App: Change Outbound Delivery (VL02N)

In the header, administration tab

Before Picking and Posting goods issue, let us check the stock

APP: Stock - Single Material

APP: Overdue Materials - Stock in Transit (F2139)

APP: Stock Overview (MMBE)

Pick and Post Goods Issue for Stock Transfer Order

Fiori App Manage Outbound Deliveries (F0867A)

Apart from VL02N, we can also use this APP to search for delivery document with status Ready for Picking.

Click Pick, new window pop up, enter the picked quantity and clic Save. You will have the following screen where you can proeed to Post GI.

After Post GI, the statue change from Not yet processed to Completely Processed.

Check Status of Stock Transfer

Issuing plant 1311 stock quantity decrease by 2. From 108 to 106.

After PGI, Delivery document will appear

Scheduled for delivery stock and unrestricted stock decrease by 2 in issue plant 1311. From 135 to 133, 4 to 2 respectively

After goods issue in the issuing company code, the goods have not yet been posted in the receiving plant. In accounting terms, the goods do not yet belong to the company code of the receiving plant. Both unrestricted-use stock and on-order stock remain unchanged for the receiving plant.  The quantity that is currently being shipped is visible in the system in a special stock type for cross-company code stock in transit. The cumulative value of all cross-company code stock in transit can be displayed for a plant or a complete company code.

APP: Display Stock in Transit (MB5T)

Material document with movement type 643

Accounting document

Post Goods Receipt for Stock Transfer Order

APP: Post Goods Receipt to Purchasing Document (F0843)

Post goods receipt on the purchase order and enter receipt quantity click Post.

Material document with movement type 101 created.

From a financial point of view, the materials are now posted to the stock value of the company code to which the receiving plant is assigned. During the goods receipt posting, an accounting document is created and the purchase order price is used to valuate the goods receipt (that is, if the goods receipt is posted before the incoming invoice receipt is posted)

The unrestricted-use stock in the receiving plant increases as soon as the goods receipt is posted. The on-order stock and the cross-company code stock in transit are reduced by the quantity received.

Create Intercompany Billing Document

APP: Create Billing Documents - VF04

Check Intercompany-Related

Billing document 90000391 has been created upon Save.  Please be noted the billing price was taken from PIC1 in purchase order item.

Pricing procedure Intercomp Stock Transfer is adapted here

In case you have maintained purchasing info record for PPR0, the result shows it will be inactive due to PIC1 available already

Document flow of delivery document will help find the accounting document for Billing

Create Supplier Invoice

The internal invoice that was sent by the supplying company code, needs to be posted as an incoming invoice in the receiving company code. Invoice receipt is also visible in the purchase order history of the cross-company code stock transport order. You can use the Create Supplier Invoice or the Create Supplier Invoice - Advanced app to enter manually and post a supplier invoice related to a cross-company code stock transport order.

Accounting document:

Business Process Configuration

Define Shipping Data for Delivering Plant

SSCUI 101926 Define Shipping Data for Plants

The purpose of this activity is to define shipping data for supplying plant (to allocate sales organization, distribution channel, division and customer no.to the plant for which intercompany stock transfer processing is possible). Meanwhile make sure product description include the same language version as the one maintained here.

Define Internal Customer Number By Sales Organization

SSCUI 105970 Maintain sales organizations.

Enter the following data in Customer Number for Intercompany Billing field.

Maintain Intercompany Condition Record

APP: Set Material Prices Sales on condition type PI01

Assign Picking Location

SSCUI 102130 Assign Picking Locations

Assign Shipping Points

SSCUI 102126 Assign Shipping Points

Business Partner Master Data Configuration

Create Business Partner General Data

APP: Manage Business Partner Master Data F3163

Create Business Partner ID for Ordering plant 1320

Create Business Partner ID for Supplying plant 1311

Create/Extend Customer BP by assigning Company Code and Sales Area Data

Extend Customer (Fin.Accounting) role for Ordering plant 1320 and assign company code 1310 representing this plant is the customer of company code 1310

APP: Maintain Business Partner

Extend Customer role for Ordering plant 1320 and assign sales area

Remember to maintain the tax classification for customer so that the TTX1 can be derived properly in sales order pricing

Also remember to assign shipping condition so that SSCUI 102126 Assign shipping points for each plant will derive the right shipping point

Create/Extend Supplier BP by assigning Company Code and Purchasing Organization Data

Extend Supplier (Fin.Accounting) role for Supplying plant 1311 and assign company code 1320 representing it is the supplier of company code 1320

Extend Supplier role for Supplying plant 1311 representing and assign purchase organization

Create/Extend Business Partners Representing the Plants Codes

This link the supplying plant 1311 as the supplier

 

Product Master Data Configuration

Maintain Distribution Channels and receiving and issuing plants

APP: Manage product master data

Assign Loading Group

 

Issues worth discussion

Issue 1:

Even though goods receipted has been done on receiving plant, you can still cancel the post goods issue on issuing plant (MvT 101 material document cancellation) without any check in standard logic. So one direction is to add check logic in BADI.

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻：人工智能Artificial Intelligence
entry.content:
SAP S/4HANA Cloud公共版2508版本新增了多项AI功能，通过自动化、智能分析和自然语言处理，显著提高企业的运营效率。这些更新重点聚焦在提升用户体验、实现流程自动化、获取深度业务洞察，以及优化现有功能上，旨在提高工作效率和准确性。

提示:

  • 使用SAP S/4HANA Cloud公共版中的部分生成式AI功能可能需要额外的授权和权限。有关AI功能使用的商务问题，请您咨询你的SAP客户经理。
  • 以下AI功能尚未在中国大陆地区上线，建议您咨询您的SAP客户经理以获取最新的信息。

以下是SAP S/4HANA Cloud公共版 2508版本中新增的一些主要AI功能及其介绍：

用户体验中的AI 创新：

AI辅助企业搜索 (AI-Assisted Enterprise Search)​​

  • ​​功能​​：用户现可直接在SAP Fiori Launchpad搜索栏中使用自然语言搜索业务对象。搜索结果基于AI生成的筛选条件生成，您可随时通过 ​​“AI解释”按钮​​查看筛选条件的逻辑。启用此功能需在用户档案设置中勾选 ​​“启用AI自然语言搜索”​​。
  • ​​效率提升​​：该功能使业务数据查找过程更直观高效，显著优于传统关键词搜索或复杂筛选设置，大幅提升信息获取效率。

点击图片查看视频

同时，近期推出的三项AI辅助用户体验创新功能—企业搜索(enterprise search)​​、​​轻松过滤器(easy filter)​​ 和​​智能总结(smart summarization)​​—现已在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition中免费使用。您只需接受 ​​SAP AI使用条款​​，SAP将会为您的租户启用这些功能，即刻体验更直观的交互操作、更快的洞察速度及更高的生产效率。

更多的AI辅助功能介绍（如轻松过滤器、智能总结），请参考往期博客 。

Joule for Business

虽然 SAP Joule 的发布周期与 SAP S/4HANA Cloud 公共版有所不同，但在2025年在以下的三个领域实现了突破性的增强。

  1. ​​实时业务对象洞察​​
    • 直接通过自然语言指令查看​​34类业务对象​​详情，覆盖采购/销售/生产订单等核心模块（如显示逾期采购订单项）
  2. ​​跨模块事务处理​​
    • ​​财务领域​​：对话式创建固定资产（输入：公司代码+资产类别+成本中心）
    • ​​销售领域​​：
      ✓ 动态管理到期价格（延长有效期并调整金额）
      ✓ 实时诊断销售订单阻塞问题（如信用冻结/数据缺失）
    • ​​一键生成洞察卡​​：将查询结果保存至"我的主页"（支持采购/销售订单等应用）

详细内容，请移步Joule功能全景介绍：Joule在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition... - SAP Community。

财务中的AI创新

财务业务洞察的快捷操作(Business Insights Quick Actions)

集团财务报表审阅手册 (Group Financial Statements Review Booklet)

    • 经过2502版本的beta测试后，集团财务报表审阅手册中预定义的AI辅助业务洞察功能——即快捷操作（Quick Action）——现已在最近版本中全面上线。用户可通过该功能快速生成数据分析和摘要。这些智能分析包括损益（按费用性质）、底线增长、EBIT、EBITDA、财务结果、营业收入/亏损、盈利能力、顶线增长和货币差异等。

这些洞察通过以自然语言分析突出关键数字、差异和相关背景，帮助简化财务审阅流程。    

目前您还可以在财务洞察审阅手册中使用以下预定义的AI辅助业务洞察功能：成本中心审阅手册 (Cost Centers Review Booklet)

此功能在2502发布，可以帮助您发现成本中心审查手册中的数据意义、突出数据之间的依赖关系，利用自然语言快速解释和汇总洞察，并建议相应的操作。详情请见往期博客

AI辅助解释固定资产关键指标 (AI-assisted explanation of fixed asset key figures)

    • 功能: 本功能基于SAP Business AI深度解析固定资产关键指标的计算逻辑，通过自然语言以通俗易懂的方式，向用户解释系统计算固定资产价值的过程。详细解释固定资产关键指标（如折旧和账面净值）的计算来源和构成。例如，它能详细说明在年中购置后，使用特定折旧码时，折旧值是如何计算的。

    • 效率提升: 这项功能能够显著减少理解固定资产计算所需的时间，帮助用户更好地理解复杂的资产估值细节，并确定为何会发生意外的价值变化（例如，意外过账的特殊折旧）。通过更轻松地理解资产和折旧值，提高了业务用户的生产力。它简化了解释过程，让用户能更快地掌握财务数据和价值变化，从而提升效率并支持更好的决策制定。

生成式AI创建固定资产主数据 (Generative AI capability: creating fixed asset master data)

    • 功能: 用户可通过与Joule对话，直接创建固定资产主数据（如创建笔记本电脑资产）, 从而减少错误并确保更高的数据准确性和更好的数据治理。

    • 效率提升: 它能够减少创建资产主数据所需的时间和精力，相比通过复杂的传统SAP Fiori应用程序进行导航更为高效。同时，通过对话式数据输入流程，减少了错误并确保了更高的数据准确性和更好的数据治理。此外，还能减少大规模培训时间并加快最终用户入职，通过允许用户在对话中快速输入和管理数据来提高业务用户的工作效率和满意度。

您可以查看这条视频了解更多内容Simplify Asset Accounting with SAP Business AI and SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

风险管理中的AI创新

  1. AI辅助的贸易分类建议与模糊搜索 (AI-assisted trade classification proposals with fuzzy search)
    • 功能: 从SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud 2508版本开始，系统将通过使用SAP HANA模糊搜索技术，根据现有产品分类的相似性搜索，为产品分配海关关税号和商品代码的贸易分类建议。系统会根据产品描述的比较生成匹配列表和估计准确度的分数。
    • 效率提升: 贸易分类可能复杂且耗时，此功能自动化并加速了这一过程，通过根据已有的贸易产品分类提供准确的分类建议，减少了手动工作量和潜在错误。提高了贸易分类专家的生产力。

质量管理中的AI创新

SAP Document AI辅助处理入库质量证书 (AI-Assisted Processing of Incoming Quality Certificates with SAP Document AI)

    • 功能: 此功能能够自动处理入库质量证书文件。SAP Document AI提取质量证书数据，并尽可能自动将证书附加到相关的证书收据，或者在没有匹配收据的情况下创建新的收据。如果系统无法明确识别或更新收据，用户可以在新的“审查证书文档匹配”应用程序中查看提取的数据并手动完成匹配。这是一个全自动化的流程，显著减少了手动输入和人为错误。此功能无需定制开发，可立即为客户带来价值。
    • 效率提升: 通过自动化处理，它显著减少了手动输入和人为错误，从而更高效地处理证书，确保信息不丢失或被忽略。质量技术人员被解放出来，可以专注于更具战略性和增值性的活动。这也能实现更快的库存发布，减少与检查相关的生产延误，并全面提高吞吐量。

可扩展性AI助手 (Extensibility AI Assistant)

    • 功能: 这是一个由生成式AI驱动的助手。在“自定义字段”应用程序中，它能帮助您完成与字段可扩展性相关的各种任务，例如创建自定义字段、查找业务上下文、用法、值帮助视图和启用业务场景。在“自定义逻辑”应用程序中，该助手还可以根据您的自然语言输入来查找BAdI（业务附加项）。它通过智能的用法分析增强了透明度，支持更好的治理和更高效的变更管理。
    • 效率提升: 您只需用日常语言描述需求，AI就能自动查找和创建所需内容。这将极大地减少手动配置和探索的时间，让字段扩展和BAdI查找任务变得前所未有的快速和高效。它还能帮助自定义字段与底层业务流程保持一致，提高系统行为的一致性和相关性。

 

 管理本地化表单模板(Manage Localized Form Templates)

此功能在2502版本中发布, 您可以在此应用程序中，通过自然语言描述来对SAP发布的本地化表单模板进行扩展。在2508版本中，在“管理本地化表单模板”应用的表单生成屏幕中添加了提示词（prompt）历史记录部分。您可以通过查看提示历史记录中的提示词来检查对表单模板扩展执行过哪些操作。

entry.title: News from SAP Activate SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 and more
entry.content:
We are pleased to announce the availability of the updates to SAP Activate and share exciting news – the launch of Joule in SAP Activate road map viewer – for customers, partners, and SAP internal users. We are also excited about the new visual design of the home page in the road map viewer and the updated user experience. This release introduces several exciting updates to the implementation guidance across a range of SAP Activate assets. We continue to aim to streamline and improve the implementation process, providing a more seamless experience for our valued users. Here are the key highlights for this release:

  • NEW - Enhance Your SAP Activate road map viewer Experience with Joule
  • Revamped Visual Design for the SAP Activate road map viewer
  • NEW - SAP Activate provisioning road map for SAP Business Suite packages
  • SAP Activate Community Blogs and Activate Minute Videos
  • Updates to SAP Activate for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition
  • Updates to SAP Activate for SAP Cloud ERP Private Edition
  • Updates to SAP Activate for SAP Business Technology Platform
  • Updates to SAP Activate for Conversion of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2-system to 3-system landscape
  • Updates to SAP Activate for SAP SuccessFactors
  • SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Test Automation Tool 2508 Release

Enhance Your SAP Activate road map viewer Experience with Joule

We are thrilled to share that Joule is now generally available in the SAP Activate road map viewer. With Joule, customers, partners and SAP internal users can quickly ask Activate related questions and receive clear, helpful answers – making it easier to unlock the full value of SAP Activate.

Joule is available to all SAP for Me users and currently supports two of our most widely used road maps:

  • SAP Activate for SAP Cloud ERP Private – New Implementation
  • SAP Activate for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition (3-system landscape)

To learn more about how to interact with Joule, check out the blog post here.

 

Revamped Visual Design for the SAP Activate road map viewer

We’ve enhanced the onboarding experience for new users of the SAP Activate road map viewer by introducing a fresh visual design, updated guidance, and built-in onboarding resources right on the home screen. Learn more about these improvements in this blog post. 

 

NEW SAP Activate provisioning road map for SAP Business Suite packages

We’re excited to announce the release of a dedicated SAP Activate provisioning road map for SAP Business Suite packages. This new resources is now available to customers in the road map viewer, and you can find more details in the blog post here.

 

SAP Activate Community | SAP Activate Blogs | SAP Activate Minute Videos

Join the SAP Activate Community to explore valuable content and resources while connecting with SAP partners, clients and internal colleagues by participating in discussions and sharing knowledge.

Make sure to follow the SAP Activate tag to access blog posts like those highlighted here, along with additional insights shared by SAP Activate experts within the community.

Recap of some blog posts from the community:

  • New Road Maps for SAP Business Network - Supplier Portal Private Edition and Commerce Automation by Ana Goetze
  • Key Enhancements to the SAP Fieldglass Road map by Ana Goetze
  • Learn Quickly via the SAP Activate Minute Videos by Dan Ciecko
  • Planning your System Conversion to SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition following SAP Activate by Jose Marquez Mares
  • Security, Data Protection and IAM guidelines in SAP Activate for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition by Kiran Bose
  • Accelerating Implementation with SAP Activate in the Public Cloud by user pranavgarud
  • Guiding Your Cloud Journey: The New SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition - Adoption Plan Roadmap by Christina Galbreath
  • Unlocking Innovation: Understanding SAP’s Clean Core and Its Benefits (for IT Leaders) by user arpin
  • Explore the SAP Activate Methodology using a reimagined Road Map Viewer by Ana Goetze
  • NEW SAP Activate provisioning road map for SAP Business Suite packages by Adnette Kamugisha

 

Updates of SAP Activate for SAP S/HANA Cloud Public Edition in 2508

The SAP Activate for SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (3-system landscape) implementation roadmap has been enhanced based on product management input, system functionality changes, and customer feedback. Below are highlights for this release.

  • Introduced a new road map, SAP Activate for Cloud ERP, to guide customers through a cloud ERP implementation. This road map is the continuation of the Provisioning Enablement for SAP Cloud ERP road map and will be expanded to include all the products in the business suite packages.
  • Added road maps, SAP Business Network for Commerce Automation and SAP Ariba, to the combinable road map list in SAP Cloud ALM. This allows for better flexibility when implementing functionality related to the business suite packages.
  • Added a new deliverable, Introduction to SAP Business Suite, and three new tasks to the Discover phase to support learning about the SAP Business Suite along with the GROW with SAP and Rise with SAP journeys.
  • Added references to SAP WalkMe to increase visibility on how SAP WalkMe can help during the implementation.

 

Updates of SAP Activate for Cloud ERP Private Edition

The SAP Activate Methodology content for SAP Cloud ERP Private Edition continues to be enhanced to help guide the customer through the journey of a new implementation, system conversion, and selective data transition following the SAP Clean Core principles. These journeys are accessible by selecting the appropriate journey tag within the single roadmap in road map viewer or individually in SAP Cloud ALM.

Key highlights include:

  • In coordination with the Regional Implementation Group (RIG), several updates have been made in the roadmaps for SAP Activate for SAP Cloud ERP Private - New Implementation. 
  • The Discover phase has been updated with a new deliverable Introduction to SAP Business Suite Discover Phase and three new tasks Understand your SAP Cloud Journey, Review the SAP Business Suite Offering and Try SAP. These new tasks aligned with the new Business Suite messaging and content on the sap.com. 
  • All the transition scenarios now include WalkMe Premium guidance and project implementation can leverage the WalkMe as a digitial adoption platform to help enhance user onboarding and enablement throughout their transformation journey. Learn more by reviewing the WalkMe product tag.   
  • During System Conversion customers can leverage the RISE with SAP System Transition Workbench, a tool that offers a single, highly automated, guided system transition processes that integrates all essential technical activities and tools. Learn more by reviewing the SAP Blog - Introducing the RISE with SAP System Transition Workbench.
  • Several updates made to the Data Management workstream, with updated tasks, description, procedure steps and updated accelerators. 
  • In the past few releases, we made updates to the Project Management workstream. The updates include enhanced description of key deliverables, tasks and accelerators and improve workflow efficiency and ensure consistency across project lifecycle. 

 See the release notes for a complete list of all improvements.

 

Updates of SAP Activate for SAP Business Technology Platform

We’re excited to announce the release of new content designed to support customers in the following topics:

  • Implementation of SAP Integration Suite capabilities - It offers a structured approach that leverages best practices, tools, and methodologies to support end-to-end integration project lifecycles — from discovery and planning to implementation and go-live.
  • New content to help assist customers with the migration from SAP Process Orchestration (SAP PO) to the modern, cloud-based SAP Integration Suite and covering the following aspects of the migration project
    • A phased migration approach tailored to your landscape
    • Best practices for analyzing and refactoring integration content
    • Tooling support and checklists for assessment and execution
  • End-to-end implementation guidance for SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP) application development capabilities. This content supports teams in identifying business cases, selecting the right cloud development models, and successfully designing, building, and deploying applications using SAP BTP.

 

Updates of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2-system landscape to 3-system landscape 

We are excited to share the latest improvements to the SAP Activate guidance for our SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition customers converting from a 2-system landscape to a 3-system landscape. Since the last major release in January, we have made several updates to the guidance based on our learnings from conversion projects. The key updates are outlined below:

  • Added guidance for the use of the Parallel Line capability after the conversion to the 3-system landscape. This includes the self-enablement tasks in the Prepare and Run phases as well as a new task redirecting to the Parallel Line content in SAP Activate for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, 3-system landscape. (link)
  • Added new task Request Activation of Scope Item 5XU to Use SAP Document and Reporting Compliance into the Prepare phase to trigger the activation checks earlier in the conversion process. (link)
  • Updated task Activate Scope Item 5XU to Use SAP Document and Reporting Compliance in the Realize phase. (link)
  • Added new task, Validate IT contact prior to contract signature, to the Discover phase to ensure the IT contact is available during the conversion weekend. (link)
  • Updated task Create SAP for Me case to allow SAP proactively check your environment to indicate that part of the procedure is only intended for Solution Builder based cases. (link)
  • Added new task, Fix the affected workflows to the Realize phase with instructions on how to fix and re-transport the workflows. Including new accelerator Help - Flexible Workflow - Agent Rules that is added to the task (link)
  • Added a new task, Copy Missing Business Roles from Production System to Test System, to the deliverable Initial System Access After Conversion, to copy business roles from the production tenant to the test tenant when they are missing.

We recommend that you review the detailed release notes in the SAP Activate road map viewer for the latest content updates and view the conversion overview video here. Additionally, bookmark the SAP Community page dedicated to conversion topics here.

 

Updates of SAP Activate for SAP SuccessFactors

The SAP Activate for SAP SuccessFactors roadmap has been enhanced based on product management input, system functionality changes, and customer feedback. Below are the highlights:

  • Updated phase/workstream graphic to reflect the current deliverable structure in the road map.
  • Expanded the Baseline Activation Service for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition and SAP SuccessFactors road map by adding SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central.
  • Updated the several tasks in the Project Management workstream to be consistent and combinable with other road maps.
  • Added references to SAP WalkMe to increase visibility on how SAP WalkMe can help during the implementation.

 

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Test Automation Tool 2508 Release

The 2508 release introduces significant enhancements to the Test Automation Tool (TAT) for SAP S/4HANA Cloud, Public Edition, with a focus on improved usability and intelligent navigation. Key highlights include:

  • Enhanced Post Upgrade Tests Dashboard
    • Advanced Filtering: Easily filter results by Test Plan, Release, Process Type, Status and Application Area
    • Focused Analysis: Reduce information overload and quickly access relevant data
    • Faster Decision-Making: Improved data visualization for faster analysis
  • Joule Navigation Integration
    • Universal Access: Joule navigation is now available across all TAT applications
    • Seamless Movement: Deep links enable effortless movement between test automation modules
    • Prompt-Based Access: Quickly open any TAT app using intuitive prompts

These enhancements greatly boost testing efficiency, minimize manual navigation, and increase user productivity throughout all test automation workflows.

For more details, refer to the blog on the 2508 features in the Test Automation Tool.

 

Run simple – SAP Activate – Accelerate and simplify the adoption of SAP S/4HANA Cloud.

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508亮点前瞻：寻源和采购
entry.content:
本篇博客展示在 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508当中寻源和采购版块发布的新功能以及重大变化和须知，将会覆盖以下话题内容：

  • 寻源和合同管理
  • 运营采购
  • 集中采购
  • 发票管理

寻源和合同管理

批量更改采购信息记录

APP批量更改采购信息记录：新版本中的这款应用，您现在可以使用 “价格条件有效日期”作为筛选条件，根据采购信息记录的条件记录有效性来显示其报表。“价格条件有效日期” 筛选器仅可以输入单个日期值。当指定日期处于条件有效期内（包括 “有效起始日” 和 “有效截止日”）时，相关采购信息记录将被显示出来。

管理采购计划协议

APP管理采购计划协议：新版本中的这款应用，您现在可以使用 “源系统” 和 “外部参考标识” 字段，查看采购计划协议的源系统详情及外部编号。

批量更改采购合同

APP:批量更改采购合同。新版本中的这款应用，您现在可以更新支持版本管理的采购合同中的“变更原因”和“采购员注释”字段。

运营采购

应用变更

弃用应用：我的采购申请 和 创建采购申请。对应的后继应用：我的采购申请-新 已改名为我的采购申请

弃用应用 “处理采购申请（已弃用）” 已更名为 “处理采购申请 - 已弃用”。其替代应用 “处理采购申请（V2）” 已更名为 “处理采购申请”。我们建议您早日使用替代应用。

服务执行者的消息配置

在新版本中，您可以在 “管理采购申请 - 专业” 中配置创建服务项目或限制采购申请的服务项目时，针对 “服务执行者” 字段显示的消息。如果您将该消息配置为错误消息，那么除非您填写 “服务执行者”，否则无法继续创建项目。在为 “服务执行者” 配置消息后，消息文本将显示为 “请输入与您所选类别对应的服务执行者”。

SSCUI:102364 Define Attributes of System Messages

采购申请中的 DMS 表头附件

在本次版本中，当 HDM（统一文档管理）处于激活状态时SSCUI: 105346，您现在可以使用 DMS（文档管理服务）。作为采购人员，在 “创建采购申请 - 高级版” 应用中，您现在可以通过 “文档” 标签页使用 DMS 附件。作为采购人员，在 “管理采购申请 - 专业版” 应用中，您现在可以通过 “附件” 部分使用 DMS 附件

采购订单输出中的附加字段

有了此功能，您现在可以在采购订单输出和输出预览中查看其他字段，适用于打印和电子邮件输出渠道。
以下字段现已可用：
・采购组（买方组）的电话号码
・我方参考号
・您方参考号

监控采购订单行项目

通过这款应用，您现在可以使用 “申请人”来筛选采购订单项目。您还可以在列表页面添加 “申请人” 列。

按账户分配的采购订单项目

通过这款应用，您现在可以使用 “已分配值仍待开发票” 字段，根据账户分配的分配情况查看采购订单项目中仍待开票的金额。“已分配值仍待开发票” 字段是根据账户分配的分配百分比计算得出的。

集中采购

集中处理采购申请和集中管理采购订单应用中的额度合同

在本次版本中，“额度合同” 和 “合同项目参考” 字段现已在 “集中处理采购申请” 和 “集中管理采购订单” 应用中可用。此外，通过 “管理业务流程自动化规则” 应用，采购申请自动化功能现已启用

集中采购合同行项目的价格单位

在本次版本中，在 “管理集中采购合同” 应用里，您现在可以在创建新的行项目时，在发布集中采购合同及集中采购合同层级结构之前，编辑 “价格单位” 字段的值。

发票管理

2508版本通过这一增强功能，您现在可以设置新参数 “自动金额更正” 和 “成功后导航到供应商发票”。

当设置了新的 “成功后导航到供应商发票” 参数，且您从应用“供应商发票列表” 中打开一张供应商发票并进入编辑模式时，在您成功完成某项操作（如过账、保存或冲销该供应商发票）后，系统会直接将您导航回 应用“供应商发票列表”。

此外，当您设置新的 “自动金额更正” 参数后，在录入发票（参照采购凭证）的过程中会进行自动金额更正。这意味着，如果您修改了发票行项目的数量，系统会自动计算出新的项目金额。但如果您已手动录入项目金额，之后再修改数量，系统则不会重新计算金额。

entry.title: SAP ERP公有云 [SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition] 2508亮点前瞻：供应链管理和质量管理
entry.content:
在本篇博客中，我将会重点展示在 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508版本当中供应链管理和质量管理版块发布的新增功能，将会覆盖以下话题内容： 

  • 供应链管理：库存管理、订单承诺、库存盘点、仓库管理等
  • 质量管理：质量检验

此外，有关运输管理以及更多仓库管理相关内容请查看对应专题博客。

 

供应链管理 

 （亮点1：）库存管理 – 预留

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508版本在库存管理领域预留功能块推出了新扩展功能，具有Extensibility Specialist - SAP_BR_EXTENSIBILITY_SPEC的权限的授权用户可使用数据源扩展性在自定义字段-Custom Fields应用中的数据源扩展-Data Source Extensibility页签下为以下预留应用添加如物料主数据中的工厂和库存地点等显示字段。

  • 预留Reservation Factsheet (F5690)
  • 管理手动预留Manage Manual Reservations (F4839)
  • 管理预留项目Manage Reservation Items (F5601)
  • 管理预留的物料凭证Manage Material Documents for Reservations (F7279)

以上扩展功能可提高预留相关应用的灵活性，增强数据可视化能力。通过添加自定义字段，客户可以更好地跟踪库存位置和状态，提升整体管理效率。

 

（亮点2：）库存管理 – 库存分析和控制相关预测场景弃用

请注意随着之后SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2608版本的发布，以下系统预定义的预测场景在库存分析与控制领域届时将会被正式弃用：

  • 低周转或停滞物料（App ID：F2137）中的预测场景：MMSLO_STOCK_LEVEL_02（针对低周转或停滞物料的库存水平数据）。
  • 低周转或停滞物料（App ID：F2137）中的预测场景：MMSLO_CONSUMPTION_02（针对低周转或停滞物料的库存消耗数据）。
  • 逾期物料-在途库存（App ID：F2139）中的预测场景：MATERIAL_OVERDUE_SIT（在途库存逾期物料）。

请注意使用预测场景需要在上面智能场景管理中进行相应的配置，具体可参考SAP Help Portal：如何使用预测分析模型监控低周转物料。

尽管以上预测场景之后将被弃用，但以上应用的正常库存分析功能仍能覆盖您的业务范围，推荐您的继续使用。如果您在使用时需要进一步帮助，可以使用SAP的AI驱动助手- Joule，要访问和使用SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition中的Joule，可能需要额外的许可和授权。建议您咨询您的SAP客户经理（account executive）以获取更多信息。

 

 （亮点3：）库存管理 – 物料凭证概览（MB51替代应用）

 使用MB51显示物料凭证可以查询物料移动过账相关的物料凭证，了解货物的进销存情况，现在您可以使用MB51的替代应用物料凭证概览（App ID：F1077）来继续实现这一业务需求。如下图显示，您可以使用物料凭证概览应用显示物料凭证的基本信息，以及点击查询细节，同时可以对物料凭证作出冲销等操作，方便快捷。

 

（亮点4：）库存管理 – 库存-多种物料（MB52替代应用）

库存查询是了解当前库存水平以及决策的依据和基础。常见的使用MB52显示仓库库存应用可以批量查询物料在工厂、库存地点级别的库存情况，现在您可以使用MB52的替代应用库存-多种物料（App ID：F1595）来继续实现这一业务需求。如下图显示，您可以同时显示多颗物料的库存情况，包括库存数量、金额以及特殊库存。

 

（亮点5：）库存管理 – 工厂管理概览应用 弃用

工厂管理概览应用（App ID: F3020）在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508版本中已被弃用，并将在未来的版本中从 SAP Fiori 主页中删除。该应用由代表特定供应链管理KPI的卡片组成，比如库存分析、缺陷管理、交货绩效分析等。这些卡片中的信息目前已在下列应用中得到了继承，推荐有需求的客户尽快转换至现有应用实现业务管理需求。

  • 库存 - 多种物料（App ID: F1595）查看：按库存类型划分的库存价值/按特殊库存类型划分的库存价值；
  • 管理缺陷（App ID: F2649）查看：含缺陷的检验批/最常见缺陷物料；
  • 分析交货绩效（App ID: F2878A）查看：交货绩效。

 

 

（亮点6：）订单承诺 – 显示产品可用性

在现代供应链管理中，产品可用性至关重要。SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508的Display Product Availability显示产品可用性应用（App ID: F7884）新增功能，允许用户查看特定产品的可用性计划变更时间表，并分析影响产品可用性的因素，如MRP元素等。通过这些功能，企业能够更有效地识别库存问题，优化供应链和生产计划，进而精准预测需求，调整库存策略，以应对市场变化和需求波动。

 

 

 

 

（亮点7：）库存盘点 – 新Fiori应用：管理库存盘点项目清单

随着SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508版本的更新，SAP在库存盘点板块推出了一款新的Fiori应用：管理库存盘点项目清单-Manage Physical Inventory Item List (App ID: F8634)，此应用将逐步替代旧版应用Process Physical Inventory Count Results (MI20)。

新应用管理库存盘点项目清单Manage Physical Inventory Item List (F8634)可提升用户体验，您可以快速查看各物料的实际库存状态，从而更高效地处理时间紧迫的库存任务。改善的列表视图一目了然，方便客户节省决策时间。同时支持扩展选项以满足客户的个性化定制需求，帮助客户根据实际工作流程进行个性化调整。例如，您可以增加存储Bin位等字段，以获取更精准的物料仓库储存位置信息。同时，新应用有更快速的发现和分析功能，增强的过滤功能助客户迅速分析库存差异，深入洞察库存数据。推荐有需求的用户及时切换至这款新应用测试并使用。

 

 

（亮点8：）仓库管理 – 弃用运行出库流程-交货/流程-生产 (F5164 / F1704)

运行出库流程-交货和运行出库流程-生产已弃用，您可以使用管理库存交货订单作为其替代应用。管理库存交货订单可以处理外向交货单中库存地点是cloud WM管理的库位的单据，包括创建仓库拣配任务、打印装货说明、发货过账以及冲销发货过账，同时支持更改冲销发货过账的过账日期，您可参考范围项目（Scope Item）：3BS进行测试。

 

（亮点9：）仓库管理 - 比较仓库管理与库存管理之间的库存

准确的库存管理至关重要，SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508提供的新功能Compare Stock with Inventory Management应用使企业能够轻松检查仓库管理（WM层）与库存管理（IM层）中的库存数据。这一应用不仅帮助用户识别WM层和IM层库存数据之间的差异，还提供基于仓库中的实际库存去更新IM层库存数量从而更正IM层和WM层的库存差异的功能。通过使用此工具，企业可以确保库存记录的一致性，减少差异带来的运营风险，提高库存管理的准确性和效率，进而优化供应链流程。

 

 

（亮点10：）交货管理 – 装运点配置UI更新

SSCUI: 分配运送地点（ID:102126）中，手工装运点字段现已被更新为备选装运点，以增强在文档处理过程中选择替代装运点的清晰度和准确性，如销售订单中的装运点字段等。

 

质量管理

（亮点11：）质量检验 – 记录检验结果

 在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508版本中，记录检验结果应用（App ID: F1685A）新增筛选功能，用户现可通过“代码可分配”和“代码组可分配”筛选器来查看已设为非活动或标记为删除的缺陷代码及缺陷代码组。这一更新为用户提供了更灵活的视角来管理和分析质量数据，确保在处理质量问题如创建缺陷时考虑到所有潜在因素，从而优化质量控制流程。请注意使用这一功能的先决条件是必须有相应状态的缺陷代码和缺陷代码组。

 

  

以上是SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud 2508版本中供应链管理和质量管理的亮点更新内容，更多更新请查阅What's New in SAP S/4HANA Cloud 2508.

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻：销售话题
entry.content:
本篇文章重点展示在 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508版本中，销售板块发布的新增功能，将覆盖以下主题内容：

  1. 灵活对账科目调整和现金结算
  2. 基于项目创建销售订单里程碑开票计划
  3. 第三方销售供应商开票增强检查
  4. 增强销售凭证中自定义字段的容量
  5. 打印销售凭证输出的所有文本
  6. 管理开票凭证应用文本升级
  7. 销售贷/借项支持可配置物料

1.灵活对账科目调整和现金结算

业务场景

出于以下需求，公司开票时需要过账到可选择的对账科目:

  • 基于各个地区或者国家的税收法规，公司需要使用不同的对账科目，这确保了遵守当地的税收和会计准则。
  • 处理多种货币全球业务中，需要基于不同货币使用可调节的对账科目。
  • 对同一客户出于不同业务需要使用不同的替代对账科目，比如主营业务和非主营业务。

在过去，通常会创建新的开票类型，然而在公有云中，这个配置点是不开放的，我们将通过实行灵活开票过账来满足客户需求。

前提配置

系统实现

详细视频演示：灵活对账科目调整和现金结算

2.基于项目创建销售订单里程碑开票计划

业务场景

从EPPM（Enterprise Portfolio and Project Management）中为企业项目创建销售订单开票计划现在更容易了。当销售订单行项目与企业项目的WBS元素相关联时，您可以参照项目里程碑创建开票计划。

详细视频演示：基于项目创建销售订单里程碑开票计划 

3.第三方销售供应商开票增强检查

业务场景

在过账供应商发票时实施了增强检查，以确保在销售订单中正确设置了开票状态。如果相关的销售订单无法更新（例如：被锁定），供应商发票过账将被拒绝。

在过去，用户在创建供应商发票同时另一用户在编辑第三方销售订单，当创建供应商发票成功后会导致第三方销售订单中的开票状态更新错误，导致无法进行后续开票业务。2508版本更新后解决了这个问题。

4.增强销售凭证中自定义字段的容量

业务场景

在2508版本中， Sales Document Item (Business Context: Sales: Sales Document Item)中自定义字段的容量已经增加。最新容量：

  • 字段容量：170
  • 字节容量：6800（过去1700）

5.打印销售凭证输出的所有文本

业务场景

您可以为整个销售凭证或单个项目的文本类型和语言的特定组合创建这些文本。您甚至可以用当前不可用的语言创建文本。以前，在打印销售凭证或销售凭证项目时，这些文本不会显示在输出中。现在，它们可以被打印出来。

6.管理开票凭证应用文本升级

业务场景

在之前的“管理开票凭证”应用程序中，将标题或项目级别的文本保存到开票凭证中可能会导致该文本中插入换行符。版本更新后使用当前的功能，系统现在完全按照输入的方式保存文本，并且没有换行符（除非您手动插入了换行符）。

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻：可拓展性
entry.content:
大家好，我们即将迎来 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 大版本的更新。在本篇博客中，我将会重点展示在 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 当中可拓展性部分的亮点更新内容。本次更新主要包含可拓展性对象、ABAP 开发工具、可拓展性助手的相关更新。

可拓展性对象变更概览

在本次的更新中，我们进一步丰富了支持的 CDS View , BAdI 以及 API 的种类，扩充了支持的字段，以进一步满足公有云客户的客制化需求。例如新增了两个 BAdIs ，BADI_CTE_CB_COST_OBJECT 和 BADI_CTE_FP_CB_AD_DETM_DOC_KEY 。前者可以用于修改更改成本对象数据，后者可以用于确定现金预付款的 Concur 参考文档密钥。在贷项凭证的 API - Credit Memo Request (A2X, OData V2) 里， A_CreditMemoRequestItem 实体下新增以下字段的支持： PurchaseOrderByShipToParty, CorrespncExternalReference, CorrespncExtRefByShipToParty, Batch, ProductGroup, BillingDocumentDate 。

同时值得注意的一点是，Purchase Requisition 的 OData V2 API - API_PURCHASEREQ_PROCESS_SRV 已经过时，请大家尽快切换到后继的 OData V4 API - API_PURCHASEREQUISITION_2 ，以免影响业务。

您可以通过以下链接进一步了解本次所有更新的可拓展性对象： Overview of Changes in Extensibility Objects | SAP Help Portal

 

ABAP 开发工具更新

本次版本更新中， ADT（ABAP Development Tool）同样迎来了很多更新，例如 ABAP SQL 消费模型、创建 CDS 表实体的行为定义、增强元素信息弹窗、改进 ABAP 覆盖率视图等等。这些功能都可以有效增强开发者可拓展性的范围和使用体验。

您可以访问以下链接了解 ADT 的详细更新：What's New Viewer - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition | SAP Help Portal

 

可拓展性助手

以下功能需要有额外的 Licence ，可以参考链接了解更详细的内容：GenAI-Driven Extensibility Assistant | SAP Help Portal

可扩展性助手是一个由生成式人工智能驱动的助手。在自定义字段这个应用程序中，它可以帮助您完成与字段可扩展性相关的各种任务，如创建自定义字段、查找业务上下文、查找用量、查找价值帮助视图和启用业务场景。在自定义逻辑这个应用程序中，可扩展性助手可以基于您的业务需求输入，找到合适的 BAdIs ，即业务增强点。

目前在自定义字段这个应用里，支持以下方式调用可拓展性助手：

在开始屏幕中调用扩展性助手：在自定义字段列表右上角的按钮栏上，您会发现一个菱形按钮。单击它将打开扩展性助手，您可以在其中在标记为 Your Question 的文本框中输入您的问题或请求。然后将指导您完成后续步骤。您可以随时在文本框中输入其他问题。若要结束对话并确保不考虑以前的讨论，请单击扩展性助手窗口右下角的重置 。

在详细信息屏幕中调用扩展性助手：在屏幕底部的按钮栏上，您将找到菱形按钮。单击它将打开扩展性助手，您可以在标记为 Your Question 的文本框中键入您的问题或请求。例如，如果您想询问有关详细信息屏幕上显示的自定义字段，则可以使用 “this field” 之类的表达式来引用它。一个常见的用例是通过 OData 服务、UI、CDS 视图或 SOAP API 寻求帮助以发布字段。

当前，可拓展性助手只支持英语的输入和输出。

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻：分析报表
entry.content:
最新的SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508版本为分析带来了强大的功能增强，突显了SAP致力于提供优质数据分析工具的承诺。此次更新不仅提升了效率，还增强了嵌入式分析的可用性和功能。下面我们将深入探讨这个版本的重要功能。

  • 视图浏览器增强
  • 多维分析：图表功能升级
  • 审核手册：页面评论功能
  • 审核手册APP中的“重置”功能
  • 升级审核手册报表
  • 【重要】弃用的分析业务目录
  • 【重要】CE2508 弃用的CDS 视图

视图浏览器增强

此次发布的一大亮点是视图浏览器应用的增强。现在，视图浏览器应用使用多维分析来显示发布的分析查询，而不是传统的Web Dynpro Grid。这种变化为用户提供了更灵活和直观的数据分析界面，使复杂数据集的可视化和解释更加有效。

 

 

此外，用户可以方便地访问有关已弃用的CDS视图的详细信息，包括其弃用日期和替代者细节。这通过一个简单的链接或直接导航到相应的CDS视图来实现。此功能确保客户能够清晰快速了解到目前自开发项目的状态，从而有效地规划和管理。

 

多维分析：图表功能升级

CE2508在多维分析功能中进行了显著增强，特别是在图表功能区域。新增的系列轴功能，大大提升了数据可视化。该功能允许用户在图例或系列轴上添加维度，从而提供更大的数据呈现的灵活性。

目前，系列轴功能支持众多图表类型，包括柱状图、条形图、折线图、组合柱线图、热图、堆积条形图、堆积柱形图、百分比堆积条形图和百分比堆积柱形图。这种广泛支持确保客户能够选择最适用的图表类型，以准确地表达其数据情境。

 

审核手册：页面评论功能

在本次更新中，最引人注目的新功能之一是页面评论功能。该功能允许用户将评论附加到特定报告页面，并将其与相关筛选条件、维度和度量联系起来。这不仅促进了实时协作和反馈跟踪，还确保即使视图发生变化，每个人都在相同的数据背景下工作。这一改进显著提升了数据分析的无缝协作能力。

 

页面评论功能涵盖了几个直观的操作：

  • 添加评论： 用户可以轻松为当前视图添加评论，并自动保存相关变量、筛选条件、维度、结构和度量。
  • 管理讨论： 支持通过回复进行线程讨论或为不同话题发起新的讨论线程。
  • 显示评论： 评论默认与当前视图链接，用户可以通过关键词、分类、标签和状态进行快速搜索。
  • 编辑与协作： 用户可以编辑评论属性并使用标签通知团队成员，促进针对特定分析需求的协作数据讨论。

这项功能的推出，为团队成员之间的信息分享和合作提供了强大的支持，有助于更精准地满足数据分析的需求。

 

审核手册： “重置”功能

为了进一步简化分析流程，审查册中引入了“重置”按钮。在分析数据时,应用各种过滤器和进行详细的深入分析是常见步骤，然而，要回到默认设置重新开始分析常常需要繁琐的手动调整。有了“重置”按钮，用户现在只需点击一下即可轻松恢复默认布局，即标准视图。这项功能通过简化重置分析参数的步骤，提高了用户的工作效率。

 

升级审核手册报表

在系统升级之后，审核手册可能不是最新的，需要更新以提供最新的配置和功能。

当用户打开审核手册的配置时，需要升级的审核手册会提示用户改审核手册需要升级。升级确保所有审核手册保持高度的更新性和功能性，从而为用户提供有效的分析能力。

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻: 财务
entry.content:
【计划安排】
三系统升级及维护计划 
两系统升级及维护计划

【新功能】
1. “过账资产购置-和数量调整”应用支持总购置价
要通过采购过账资产购置，而无需参考采购订单以及与应付账款会计集成，而是针对清算科目过账，请使用过账资产购置 - 和数量调整应用 (F6488)。
之前，只能使用此应用过账净购置, 购置（净额）：这是标准选项。使用此选项，您可以指定（净）购置成本。
但是，现在，如果要过账除购置和生产成本 (APC) 外具有值调整的资产的资产购置，则可以进行总值过账。为此，使用新业务交易类型购置（总额）。然后，您可以输入 APC 和相关价值调整，例如普通或计划外折旧。使用此选项，您可以指定使用年限开始时的原始购置和生产成本，以及在采购前产生的资产折旧。

2. 资产过账到特殊期间(调整期间)
对于资产会计，以下内容适用：之前，在用于资产过账的 SAP Fiori 应用中，无法在特殊期间过账。现在，可以执行此操作。财务会计的标准逻辑现在适用。这意味着，如果会计年度针对正常期间关闭并且您想要过账到特殊期间，则在会计年度的最后一个期间中输入日期作为应用中的过账日期。
示例
使用 K4 作为会计年度变式，即会计年度与日历年相对应，并且您有四个特殊期间。
会计年度 YYYY 中的正常期间（1月到12月）已关闭。但是，您想要使用过账资产重估应用 (F7775) 在此会计年度中进行重估过账。
然后，指定会计年度 YYYY 的 12 月作为过账日期。然后，日记账分录将过账到此过账日期的第一个打开的未清特殊期间。
对于合同和租赁管理，这同样适用于可用于过账到资产或冲销资产过账的应用。

3. 基于事件的结算投资项目和在建工程
之前，只有一个选项可用于通过在建资产 (AuC) 将投资项目结算到已完成资产。先前的选项包括从投资项目到在建工程的定期结算；这些定期结算以汇总形式进行。
现在还有另一个选项：基于事件的结算。对于基于事件的结算，不会定期结算到在建资产；相反，投资项目的所有过账都会直接完全过账到在建资产。由于基于事件的结算将每个行项目的行项目结算到在建工程，因此稍后详细过账仍显示在在建资产中。基于事件的结算适用于发票往往很少的简单投资项目.

详细内容请参见SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻 - 基于事件结算的投资项目和在建工程

4. App资产业务的视图‘结算的日记账分录跟踪’支持基于作业的结算
在资产交易应用 (F1614) 中，您可以使用视图‘结算的日记账分录跟踪’。该视图可用于跟踪日记账分录链，该链从投资项目结算开始，到已完成资产的过账结束。
该视图现在还提供来自基于事件的结算的信息，即有关涉及的组织单位和日记账分录链的信息：对于特定资产，结算交易与合作伙伴资产（即在建资产 (AuC)）和投资项目（WBS 要素）一起列出。提供结算日记账分录和先前日记账分录的链接，其中包含到 WBS 要素的成本过账和从 WBS 要素到 AuC 的结算过账。

用户界面示例

5. CDS 视图I_FixedAssetCountryData的限制类型
CDS 视图 I_FixedAssetCountryData 提供对固定资产的国家/地区特定主数据的访问。之前，想要使用此视图的用户必须具有限制类型为 BURKS（公司代码）的业务角色。从 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2602 开始，计划添加以下限制类型：
A_S_MD（新资产主数据维护）：限制对新资产主数据的访问，例如，用于主数据维护。
BURKS_KOSTL（公司代码/成本中心）：限制对公司代码和成本中心的访问。
BUKRS_WERKS（公司代码/工厂）：限制对公司代码和工厂的访问。
要继续在您的应用中使用该 CDS 视图，您必须在版本升级到 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2602 之前将限制类型添加到业务角色分配的业务目录。

6. 对于外部审计员：资产会计中的时间范围限制
进行外部审计时，只允许审计员看到执行审计所需的信息，这一点很重要。通常，您需要限制审计员对特定时间范围（例如上一会计年度）的访问。
现在，您可以确保外部审计员只能显示特定时间范围内和特定会计准则的资产数据。
使用通用审计过滤器 (GAF) 完成时间范围限制。

时间范围限制可用于以下资产会计应用：
• 管理固定资产 (F3425)：工作清单和值显示
• 资产历史数据表 (F1615)
• 资产余额 (F1617)
• 资产交易 (F1614)
• 折旧清单 (F1616)
要定义 GAF 过滤器并将其分配到审计员，请执行以下操作：
使用管理通用审计过滤器应用 (F7285) 定义 GAF 过滤器。激活过滤器，因为只有活动过滤器有效。

使用管理通用审计过滤器用户应用 (F7503) 将 GAF 过滤器分配给审计员。
请注意，用户字段包含审计员用户

7. 资产负债表重新分类支持新的分组规则
财务会计中的高级评估使用分组规则将日记账分录行项目捆绑到组中。然后评估这些日记账分录行项目组，而不是单独评估每个行项目。对于资产负债表重新分类，有两个新的分组规则 3FLB 用于按总账科目和业务伙伴对单个行项目进行分组，4FLB，以仅按总账科目对单个行项目进行分组。
在配置活动按到期定义资产负债表重新分类规则（标识：105454）中的定义重新分类到期规则的步骤下，将分组规则分配到资产负债表重新分类的规则。在计划总账作业应用中运行过账资产负债表重新分类 - 到期时，将使用按到期的资产负债表重新分类规则。
截至此版本，系统使用缺省规则 。缺省规则根据总账科目、业务伙伴和分配参考的组合对行项目进行分组。然后，系统基于此分组重新分类此汇总余额。
在此版本中，您可以在创建自己的重新分类规则时从两个附加分组规则中进行选择：
在此版本中，您可以在创建自己的重新分类规则时从两个附加分组规则中进行选择：
3FLB ：
对于基于未清项管理的科目：行项目按总账科目和业务伙伴分组
对于基于非未清项目管理的科目：行项目按总账科目和业务伙伴分组
4FLB：
对于基于未清项管理的科目：行项目按总账科目分组
对于基于非未清项目管理的科目：行项目按总账科目分组

8. 业务上下文“集团报告日记账分录项目”中的替代/验证：新金额字段
业务详细信息
现在，您可以在 收货日记账分录项目 业务上下文中将新的金额字段用于替代规则和验证规则。
您可以使用以下新字段：
• 以本币计的金额
• 以集团货币计的金额
• 以交易货币计的金额

您可以将这些字段用作前提条件和验证字段，但不能用作替代目标字段。
实施详细信息
此功能不会自动在系统中可用，而是需要在配置活动激活功能中激活功能 COI 字段自定义替代 (FINCS_DOCANAL_COI_SUBSTITUTION)。

9. 公司间匹配和对账支持灵活差异计算逻辑
业务详细信息
对于双边匹配分配，系统会计算双方总和之间的差异，并在 管理分配 应用的 匹配详细信息 页面上显示差异金额。现在，您可以配置系统如何计算差异。
实施详细信息
配置

如果分配没有匹配规则或规则在表达式中没有金额类型，则可以使用配置活动定义匹配方法的附加设置指定在差异计算中使用的金额类型，例如 TSL、HSL、WSL 或 KSL。
您还可以使用配置活动选择计算公式。

10. 激活清账凭证中的反记账功能
业务详细信息
通过此功能，您可以在清账分录中使用负过账，以确保根据中国的法律要求正确计算总账交易额。

实施详细信息
配置
在激活国家/地区的负过账（标识 107034）配置活动中，激活中国清账中的反记账功能。

11. 分析关账运行结果 支持详细消息栏
通过此分析应用，您可以显示、过滤和分析“高级外币评估”作业的详细结果。可将其用于分析、报告和对账。
除了在执行“高级外币评估”时可在“计划总账作业”中显示的结果清单外，还可以使用此应用获取各个运行的结果详细视图。
请参阅 UI 输入屏幕的以下屏幕截图：

12. 上传模板支持备选总账科目
业务详细信息
此功能使您能够将备选总账科目字段 (LOKKT) 作为列标题添加到用于上载一般日记账分录的模板。与总账科目字段类似，备选总账科目字段用作行项目字段，字符数限制为 10。
如果贵公司使用备选科目表，您可以选择使用备选总账科目进行过账。此功能使您能够在 上载一般日记账分录 应用中上载一般日记账分录时输入备选总账科目。如果为行项目提供备选科目时，请将总账科目留空。
实施详细信息
您需要在使用前激活此功能。为此，请在应用- 编辑日记账分录的选项 中选择使用备选科目。
将备选总账科目字段 (LOKKT) 添加到模板后，可以在字段中输入备选科目编号并将总账科目字段 (HKONT) 留空。或者，您可以输入总账科目并将备选总账科目留空。
如果在模板中输入总账科目 (HKONT) 和备选总账科目 (LOKKT) 字段的值，则系统仅使用总账科目 (HKONT)。
备注
如果未在编辑日记账分录的选项应用中选择使用备选科目，则仅使用总账科目。
由于备选总账科目和总账科目是一一对应的关系，意味着通过其中任何一个科目就可以定位到另一个科目。

13. 编辑未分配流程的常量-利润中心分配 - 公司代码配置活动
在编辑未分配流程的常量 (120100) 配置活动中，您现在可以使用利润中心分配 - 公司代码配置活动为公司代码分配利润中心。
在此，您可以为过账凭证时无法派生正确科目分配的流程中的特定行项目定义缺省科目分配（例如，缺省细分）。如果过账时所需信息尚不可用，则属于这种情况。
使用缺省常量 0DFLT 定义当无法自动派生正确的科目分配时，在过账期间使用哪个科目分配。此外，不支持凭证拆分中的客户常量。
通过利润中心分配 - 全局配置活动，您可以配置哪个全局利润中心用于组织中的所有公司代码。当无法为公司代码自动派生利润中心时，利润中心分配 - 公司代码配置活动可用于定义公司代码特定的利润中心以进行过账。
当您在利润中心的两个配置活动中进行设置时，系统首先使用公司代码特定的利润中心。如果未定义公司代码特定的利润中心，则使用全局利润中心，否则将忽略利润中心。

14. 管理日记账分录支持新功能
业务详细信息
这些新功能使您能够编辑、创建和删除备选付款方和收款方，查看合并到单个标签上的代扣税信息，并选择性地为此应用激活协调凭证管理。
编辑、删除和创建备选付款方和收款方
现在，您可以编辑存在的行项目中的备选付款方和收款方。为此：
1. 在 分录视图 中打开含备选付款方或收款方的行项目。
2. 选择编辑。
3. 在编辑页面上，选择编辑备选付款方或编辑备选收款方。
4. 进行更改并保存。
在编辑页面上，您还可以选择删除备选付款方或收款方。如果已删除备选付款方或收款方并需要重新创建：
1. 在 分录视图 中打开含备选付款方或收款方的行项目。
2. 选择编辑。
3. 在编辑页面上，选择创建备选付款方或创建备选收款方。
4. 输入必填信息并保存更改，以创建新的备选付款方或收款方。
协调文档管理（可选）
已为管理日记账分录实施协调凭证管理或 HDM 功能，但此功能是可选的，如果要使用，需要您将其激活。要了解有关 HDM 优势的详细信息，请参阅协调文档管理 (HDM) 。此应用中的一个直接优势是，您可以在附加附件后对其进行编辑。
要为此应用激活 HCM，请转到配置步骤 为附件对象类型激活 HDM (105346) ，

然后针对 JOURNALENTRY 附件对象类型 选择 激活 。

激活 HDM之后，附件名称可以更改。

15. 成本估算和发布中的UI更新
组织度量屏幕的用户界面已改进。现在，您可以过滤日历日期、公司代码和分类账以显示该过账期间内标准成本估算的标记允许状态。也就是说，如果已按分类账移动会计年度变式，则会自动显示每个分类账的正确 过账期间 。这有助于您在发布允许标记时避免缺少任何分类账，尤其是在使用成本核算变式 PPC1 时。

以下是详细的更改：

新过滤器：
• 日历日期
• 公司代码
• 分类账
• 成本核算变式
• 成本核算版本
• 评估视图

列表视图
列表视图包含过滤器中的当前字段和附加字段。此外，添加了期间第一天的新列，以便按公司代码、分类账和开始日期（期间的第一个日期）正确排序。
存在已标记成本估算 和 存在已审批成本估算 列指示是否存在标记/发布的成本估算。
发出/取消允许标记
如果选择 允许标记 或 允许取消标记 按钮，则会打开一个弹出窗口，允许您立即从过滤列表中发出或取消所有成本估算的允许标记。您只需维护每个成本估算的成本核算变式和成本核算版本。

此功能在系统中不会自动可用，而是需要在配置活动激活功能中激活改进组织度量的 UI 交互 (FTGL_FPC_ORG_MEASURE_ENH) 功能。

16. 编码块业务上下文中自定义字段的替代

27. 实际成本费率计算支持成本中心独立的货币迭代

• 在成本中心会计中，实际成本率计算是常见且关键的环节。企业通常要求在不同货币层面上（如全球货币、公司代码货币、自由定义货币等）精确核算、分摊及结算成本，确保报表的准确性和合规性。
• 在CE2508版本前，实际成本率计算 - 成本中心(KSII)仅支持以全球货币进行实际成本率计算，公司代码货币及自由定义货币下的实际成本率从全球货币根据汇率换算而来，导致部分金额无法被完全贷记，残留成本滞留在成本中心，会影响后续成本分摊及账面精度，增加对账难度。

详细情况，参见SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻- 实际成本率计算 - 成本中心支持独立的货币迭代以消除成本中心差异

此应用专为生产用途而设计，但已过时，SAP 计划最终将其移除。其功能通常由后继应用涵盖。SAP 不再建议使用已弃用的应用，并在可用时建议使用该后继应用。
• 已删除
SAP 不再支持该应用，并且已从 SAP Fiori 快速启动板中将其删除。
应用弃用的初始公告与删除应用之间的期间至少为 6 个月。缺省情况下，弃用的应用在 SAP 提供的页面模板中可能不再可用。在这种情况下，您可以在应用查找器中找到该应用，直到将其删除为止。
弃用应用可能需要管理员审核分配到业务角色的业务目录。例如，确保将后继应用分配给相应的业务角色。有关详细信息，请参阅 SAP 注释 2975653 以访问包含版本特定 IAM 更改信息的所有 SAP 注释。

以下介绍比较重要的部分
35. 将成本中心组迁移到全局层次结构
使用将基于集合的组迁移到全局层次结构应用，您可以迁移管理成本中心组应用中定义的组。迁移后，这些组将成为管理全局层次结构应用中的层次结构，并且只能进行编辑。迁移还会更新将这些组用于新层次结构的应用程序。
要访问此应用，必须具有包含迁移到全局层次结构 - 当前设置 (SAP_CA_BC_HIEMIG_CURR_SET_PC) 业务目录的业务角色。SAP 提供配置专家 - 业务流程配置 (SAP_BR_BPC_EXPERT) 业务角色模板供您参考。

36. 成本中心 - 实际和成本中心 - 计划/实际的后继应用
Successor for Cost Centers - Actuals and Cost Centers - Plan/Actuals
通过成本中心 - 实际 (F0963) 和成本中心 - 计划/实际应用，您可以报告成本中心的实际数据或计划数据。这些应用的后继版本可用于成本中心审核手册 (F7763) 应用。此新应用版本未来将替换旧的成本中心 - 实际和成本中心 - 计划/实际应用。我们建议您尽快切换到后继应用成本中心审核手册。
新应用提供以下附加功能：
  所有相关的比较和 KPI 在一个应用中一目了然
  随时可用的报表比较、预定义度量、附加维度和过滤器选项
   一个屏幕上的所有报告选项

37. 管理成本中心组的后继应用
通过管理成本中心组 (F1024) 应用，您可以创建和编辑成本中心组。您还可以编辑成本中心标准层次结构。此应用的后继版本在管理全局层次结构 (F2918) 应用中提供。此新应用版本将来将替换旧的管理成本中心组应用。我们建议您尽快切换到后继应用管理全局层次结构。
新应用提供以下附加功能：
• 有效期、状态处理以及对未分配对象的分析
• 电子表格上载
• 一个屏幕上的所有层次结构维护选项
在两个涉及的应用中，都会启用新体验切换行为。如果业务最终用户同时具有旧应用和新应用的权限，则可以在两个应用版本之间切换。有关详细信息，请参阅切换到新应用版本。
在使用新应用之前，需要由管理员迁移现有成本中心组。这是一次性工作。迁移后，您可以继续在新应用中使用现有层次结构。
有关迁移流程的详细信息，请参阅如何将成本中心组迁移到全局层次结构。

38. 迁移分配周期到统一分配
这些功能使您能够将分配周期从前趋应用迁移到统一分配，执行验证运行以检查周期，在使用可变部分接收方规则时查看运行结果中的跟踪因素，比较周期的两个不同版本，并在管理分配中将附件添加到周期。
此功能由新应用监控周期迁移（应用标识：F8715）和计划间接费用会计核算作业（应用标识：F3767）的新的将周期迁移到统一分配 (SAP_FCOUA_MIGRATION) 作业计划模板组成。此功能允许您将源自前趋应用的分配周期迁移到统一分配。您可以从以下应用迁移周期：
应用标识     应用名称
KSU              间接费用分配周期 - 成本中心 - 实际

使用作业计划模板启动周期迁移，然后使用监控周期迁移应用监控迁移进度。消息日志会让您了解迁移期间出现的任何问题。成功迁移后，您可以直接从迁移结果中打开通用分配应用中的周期。

39. 弃用显示利润中心
自此版本起，显示利润中心 (KE53) 应用已弃用，将在即将发布的版本中移除。有关应用弃用的详细信息，请参阅应用的弃用流程。我们强烈建议您尽快切换到后继应用管理利润中心 (F3516)。

40. 弃用利润中心：实际行项目
自此版本起，利润中心：实际行项目 (KE5Z) 应用已弃用，将在未来发布的版本中移除。

41. 多个资产会计的app在2508版本被移除

42. 弃用现金流量表（IDCNCASH）
自 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2202 起，现金流报表 - 中国 (IDCNCASH) 应用的旧应用版本有一个后继应用：中国凭证和报表合规性中的现金流量表报表。

entry.title: SAP ERP公有云 [SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition] 2508 亮点前瞻
entry.content:
在企业资源规划系统快速发展的背景下，推动数字化转型成为企业的核心需求。在这一转变的前沿，SAP凭借其帮助企业应对复杂且不断变化的业务需求的承诺，推出了崭新的SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508，这一版本旨在将企业运营提升到前所未有的高度。本博客旨在从大中华区客户的视角，挑选部分相关性高的应用更新予以介绍。您也可以移步Cloud ERP PSCC的负责人Bert Schulze的英文博客 ，进一步了解SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508的具体内容。 关于2508中国本地化的亮点功能，您可以移步 @Yu_Ada  的中文博客。

在这个不断演变的科技时代，企业在寻求解决方案时，不仅希望与战略目标保持一致，还期待能够提升运营效率。那么，作为一名企业领导者，为什么应该考虑采用SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508来推动您的运营迈向未来呢？以下是我们 SAP Cloud ERP PSCC 团队为您解读的是该版本的一些亮点：  

运用AI优化业务流程 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻：人工智能  

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 新增了多项AI功能，这些更新重点聚焦在提升用户体验、获取深度业务洞察，以及优化现有功能上。旨在提高工作效率和准确性。 

 用户体验中的AI 创新：AI辅助企业搜索 (AI-Assisted Enterprise Search)  

用户现在可以直接在SAP Fiori Launchpad搜索栏中使用自然语言搜索业务对象,使业务数据查找过程更直观高效。 

 同时，近期推出的三项AI辅助用户体验创新功能—企业搜索(enterprise search) 、 轻松过滤器(easy filter) 和 智能总结(smart summarization) —现已在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition中免费使用。您只需接受 SAP AI使用条款 ，SAP将会为您的租户启用这些功能，即刻体验更直观的交互操作、更快的洞察速度及更高的生产效率。 

注： 本文介绍的AI功能尚未在中国大陆地区上线，建议您咨询您的SAP客户经理以获取最新的信息。 

Joule for Business：   

2025年Joule在S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition中带来了众多新功能，您可以通过自然语言指令在Joule中直接查询覆盖采购、销售、生产等核心模块的34类业务对象，消除应用切换需求。 

集团财务报表审阅手册 (Group Financial Statements Review Booklet) 

您可以在集团财务报表审阅手册中预定义的AI辅助业务洞察功能—即快捷操作（Quick Action）—中快速生成数据分析和摘要。 

 AI辅助解释固定资产关键指标 (AI-assisted explanation of fixed asset key figures) 

本功能深度解析固定资产关键指标的计算逻辑，通过自然语言以通俗易懂的方式，向用户解释系统计算固定资产价值的过程。  

Joule创建固定资产主数据 (Generative AI capability: creating fixed asset master data) 

用户可通过自然语言指令，通过Joule直接创建固定资产主数据（如创建笔记本电脑资产）, 从而减少错误并确保更高的数据准确性和更好的数据治理。 

更多详细内容请参考 @Helen_Han 的博客。 

 

改善销售管理效率 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508亮点前瞻：销售 

在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508中，销售管理板块从销售订单管理，销售开票，销售退货等进行功能更新： 

  • 灵活对账科目调整和现金结算 
  • 基于项目创建销售订单里程碑开票计划 
  • 第三方销售供应商开票增强检查 
  • 增强销售凭证中自定义字段的容量 
  • 打印销售凭证输出的所有文本 
  • 管理开票凭证应用文本升级 
  • 销售贷/借项凭证请求支持可配置物料 

灵活对账科目调整和现金结算 

 

 

 

基于项目创建销售订单里程碑开票计划 

更多销售模块详细内容请参考 @Feng_Chen 的博客。 

 

强化数据分析能力 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻：分析报表 

最新的SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508为分析带来了强大的功能增强，突显了SAP致力于提供优质数据分析工具的承诺。此次更新不仅提升了效率，还增强了嵌入式分析的可用性和功能: 

  • 视图浏览器增强 
  • 多维分析：图表功能升级 
  • 审核手册：页面评论功能 
  • 审核手册APP中的“重置”功能 
  • 升级审核手册报表 
  • 【重要】弃用的分析业务目录 
  • 【重要】CE2508 弃用的CDS 视图 

 

 

更多详细内容请参考 @AngelaDai  的博客。

优化制造流程 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508亮点前瞻：制造 

 在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition  2508制造板块增强了变更管理和物料清单管理的产品功能，同时也对生产计划替换了部分应用。 

变更管理与物料清单管理的集成增强 

监控物料覆盖范围（F2101A）替换了原来的监控物料覆盖范围（F2101） 

增强以下产品能力： 

  • 支持选择多项物料（不超过200） 
  • 显示最近一次MRP Run的日期和时间 
  • 导航到制造关键app: 如维护时间相关库存级别 
  • 显示订单报告(审核订单进度）等 

更多制造模块详细内容请参考 @RiyaYang 的博客。

优化供应链流程 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508亮点前瞻：供应链管理和质量管理 

在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508中，供应链管理板块从库存管理、订单承诺、库存盘点、仓库管理几大内容，质量管理板块从质量检验等进行功能更新，具体可查看blog。 

  • 库存管理 – 库存-多种物料（MB52替代应用） 

 

库存查询是决策的重要基础。MB52常用于查询工厂和库存地点的物料库存，现在可以用替代应用“库存-多种物料”（App ID: F1595）实现此功能。此应用允许显示多种物料的库存数量、金额以及特殊库存等信息。  

  • 仓库管理 - 比较仓库管理与库存管理之间的库存 

 

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508推出的Compare Stock with Inventory Management应用程序简化了库存对比。此应用可帮助企业检查并纠正仓库管理（WM层）与库存管理（IM层）之间的差异。该应用不仅能识别库存数据差异，还可以根据实际库存更新IM层库存数据，确保库存记录一致性，降低运营风险，提升库存管理的效率，优化供应链流程。 

更多供应链管理模块详细内容请参考 @ecco_liu 的博客。

简化采购流程与优化寻源 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻：寻源和采购 

最新的SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508中，寻源和采购版块中的下列子模块均发布了一些相关的新功能以及重大变化: 

  • 寻源和合同管理 
  • 运营采购 
  • 集中采购 
  • 发票管理 

寻源和合同管理  

APP批量更改采购信息记录：新版本中的这款应用，您现在可以使用 “价格条件有效日期”作为筛选条件，根据采购信息记录的条件记录有效性来显示其报表。“价格条件有效日期” 筛选器仅可以输入单个日期值。当指定日期处于条件有效期内（包括 “有效起始日” 和 “有效截止日”）时，相关采购信息记录将被显示出来。 

更多采购寻源模块详细内容请参考 @Qi_Liu 的博客。

提高财务透明度 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508亮点前瞻：财务 

 基于事件的结算投资项目和在建工程 

  • 基于事件结算的投资项目，其所有过账行项目都会直接完全过账到关联的投资计量在建工程，从而保持成本流转的全程可追溯，优化企业项目管理，简化用户执行投资项目到在建工程结算的工作量。 

实际成本率计算 - 成本中心支持独立的货币迭代以消除成本中心差异 

在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508前，实际成本率计算 - 成本中心(KSII)仅支持以全球货币进行实际成本率计算，公司代码货币及自由定义货币下的实际成本率从全球货币根据汇率换算而来，导致部分金额无法被完全贷记，残留成本滞留在成本中心，会影响后续成本分摊及账面精度，增加对账难度。 

详细请参考 @BobShen 的 博客。 

加强系统扩展性 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508亮点前瞻：可拓展性 

在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508的更新中，可拓展性也迎来了许多更新。本次更新主要包含可拓展性对象、ABAP 开发工具、可拓展性助手的相关更新。 可拓展性对象的调整更好地满足用户的业务需求，同时也有一些 API 已经过时，需要替换成后继版本的 API 。ABAP 开发工具的增强有助于更好的使用开发者可拓展性。可拓展性助手（需要额外 License ）让关键用户可拓展性的使用更加便捷

entry.title: Exploring AI and next-gen Cloud ERP innovations in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508
entry.content:
The 2508 release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition is out and this product blog by @BeSchulze give a great overview of the key innovation. With this update, SAP continues to push the boundaries of enterprise automation and intelligence. With the latest innovations powered by generative AI, customers benefit from improved transparency, faster decision-making, and simpler day-to-day operations. From financial consolidation to payment analysis and sustainability reporting, these updates bring intelligent capabilities directly into the flow of business. 

This video is very special as you will meet my new Synthesia avatar, who will give you a summary of the key "AI"-led innovations for this release. By the way, what do you think about this avatar? Let me know in the comments. 

 

Group Reporting: AI-assisted business insights for group financial statements review booklet

Building on the successful beta release in 2502, predefined AI-assisted business insights—also known as quick actions—are now generally available in the Group Financial Statements Review Booklet. These insights help streamline financial review processes by highlighting key figures, variances, and relevant context in natural language.

The Group Financial Statements Review Booklet, Cost Centers Review Booklet, and Project Financial Booklet – Professional Services now all include AI-powered business insights that enable faster analysis and easier interpretation of financial data. By reducing manual analysis effort and surfacing relevant context automatically, these booklets drive efficiency across various reporting tasks.

Figure 1: AI-assisted financial business insights

 

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, AI-assisted payment exception analysis

In the Manage Automatic Payments app (App ID: F0770), a new AI capability enhances the process of analyzing payment exceptions after a payment proposal run. This feature not only provides natural language explanations of payment exceptions but also highlights relevant log entries and suggests resolution actions.

This innovation reduces the time spent investigating and resolving issues in payment proposals. By guiding users directly to the root cause and recommended next steps, the process becomes significantly more efficient—improving payment accuracy and minimizing delays in financial operations.

Figure 2: AI-assisted payment exception analysis

 

Figure 3: Digital Library - AI-Assisted Features

 

Enabling automatic allocations of carbon quantities by reflecting allocations in financial accounting

With growing importance on sustainable business practices, the 2508 release introduces automatic allocation of carbon quantities aligned with financial accounting data. This feature retrieves financial flow data from the connected system and automatically calculates account assignments, target accounts, and allocation ratios.

No manual calculation of receiver percentages is needed—carbon data is allocated consistently based on monetary values. This ensures alignment between sustainability and financial reporting, offering more precise reflection of operational impact and enabling integrated performance tracking across both domains.

Figure 4: Manage Allocations – Create from Financial Flow

 

Figure 5: Automatic allocation of carbon quantities

 

Unlock seamless data access with AI-assisted easy enterprise search 

Accessing business data is now even more intuitive with the AI-assisted easy enterprise search, which allows users to search using natural language. Instead of navigating through complex structures, a simple query like “Show me sales orders overall status in process” or “Show me open sales orders that have a net value greater than 100 EUR” provides relevant results instantly.

The system adapts the search results based on the user’s role, ensuring that only the most relevant business objects are presented. This not only improves search accuracy but also accelerates insight extraction—making it easier to act quickly and confidently in a data-rich environment. To enable this feature, select the 'enable AI natural language search' checkbox in the user profile settings.

 

Currently in beta testing: AI-assisted smart personalization of My Home for applications 

Personalizing the My Home workspace becomes faster and smarter with the new AI-assisted smart personalization feature. Currently in beta testing, it allows users to tailor their applications and insight tiles using natural language.

Applications can be added in just two clicks, including a preview to confirm suitability. This streamlines customization, especially for new or infrequent users, by offering AI-powered suggestions, application descriptions, and live KPIs for dynamic tiles. The experience is intuitive and efficient, ensuring that personalization aligns with users’ daily workflows.

Interested in experiencing these improvements first-hand? Join the SAP beta testing for the latest AI-assisted features in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 and contribute to shaping future developments. For more information, see: Get Involved Early, and register today to help drive the evolution of AI advancements. 

 

Currently in beta testing: AI-assisted easy fill 

Also in beta, AI-assisted easy fill reimagines how form fields are completed. Instead of manually searching for and filling out fields, users can enter data via natural language. The system intelligently matches input to the correct fields and provides a clear overview before confirmation.

This innovation saves time, reduces navigation complexity, and increases accuracy in form completion. With automatic field matching and editable previews, easy fill offers a new level of convenience for maintaining business objects efficiently.

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 delivers a powerful set of innovations that bridge insight and action with the support of generative AI. Whether it's optimizing financial processes, enhancing personalization, or improving sustainability reporting, these features demonstrate SAP’s commitment to building a truly intelligent cloud ERP system.

Interested in experiencing this enhanced feature? Join the SAP beta testing for the latest AI-assisted features in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 and contribute to shaping future developments. For more information, see: Get Involved Early, and register today to help drive the evolution of AI advancements. 

We’re also pleased to share that three recently introduced AI-assisted user experience innovations—enterprise search,easy filter,and smart summarization—are now available in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition at no additional cost. To get started, simply accept the SAP AI Terms. Once completed, we’ll reach out to enable these capabilities on your tenants, so you can immediately begin benefiting from more intuitive interactions, faster insights, and enhanced productivity.

 

Joule for Business

With this release, Joule for Business brings a new dimension of intelligent assistance to SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, enabling business users to interact with their systems through natural language while achieving impactful outcomes faster.

Figure 6: SAP Joule for Business

By embedding artificial intelligence directly into the system, Joule acts as a digital assistant that transforms how users navigate and operate business applications. It removes technical barriers by interpreting user intent and delivering contextually relevant results, all through intuitive, conversational interaction.

 

Simplifying service contract management

Joule for Business makes managing service contracts more seamless than ever. Users can describe their needs in natural language—for example, “show me my upcoming expiring service contracts”—and Joule provides direct access to the relevant apps such as Manage Service Contracts, Service Management Overview, and the Service Contracts Dashboard.

Figure 7: Navigational assistance to service contract management applications through Joule

From reviewing performance to processing contracts at scale, apps like Mass Processing of Service Contracts and Monitor Auto Renewal Logs become instantly accessible. This intuitive guidance enhances user satisfaction, shortens time to action, and significantly increases efficiency in service contract workflows.

 

Streamlining solution order management

For managing solution orders, Joule transforms user interaction into a results-driven experience. Whether the need is to assess order profitability or track fulfillment progress, users simply express what they want in natural language. Joule interprets the request and navigates directly to apps like Solution Orders Overview or Solution Order Profitability.

Figure 8: Navigational assistance to solution order management applications through Joule

This saves time, reduces manual steps, and lets users focus on driving outcomes rather than figuring out system navigation. Joule ensures that the most relevant tools are just a prompt away, transforming how users approach solution order management.

 

AI-Assisted sales order status check

In sales operations, timely status checks are critical. Joule for Business introduces an AI-powered capability to check the status of sales orders and flag any fulfillment issues. Instead of scanning through data manually, users can now ask questions like “What’s blocking the delivery of my sales order?”

Joule responds with natural language explanations of current statuses, highlights potential delays or issues, and offers resolution suggestions. It also provides direct access to relevant applications for follow-up actions—accelerating resolution and improving transparency in the sales process.

Figure 9: Joule AI-assisted sales order status check

Joule for Business continues to evolve as a powerful ally for business users, combining the strength of generative AI with SAP’s enterprise-grade reliability to make every interaction faster, smarter, and more human-centered.

 

Shaping the future of intelligent ERP - together

As AI continues to evolve, SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition remains at the forefront—embedding intelligence directly into business processes to drive clarity, speed, and efficiency. With the 2508 release, generative AI is not just enhancing isolated tasks; it's transforming how work gets done across finance, sustainability, and user experience. Whether it’s simplifying complex reviews, automating routine actions, or making data more accessible, these innovations reflect a new standard for intelligent ERP.

We’re excited to continue this journey and invite you to explore these capabilities firsthand. Join our beta programs, share your feedback, and help shape the future of AI in the cloud. The momentum is strong—and this is only the beginning.

entry.title: Try the latest AI features in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508
entry.content:
The 2508 release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition contains enhancements to popular AI features and new natural language interaction options that help you work more intelligently and intuitively.

We’ve spent the past 6 months since the 2502 release working with your feedback – from beta programs, to roundtable discussions in the Public Cloud Practitioner Forum, to one-on-one meetings with customers – to learn how we can help you achieve more with the help of AI in your system. Let’s take a look at what’s new, update you on the commercialization of some features, and give you resources for getting involved with our upcoming beta program. 

Natural language filtering now supports a wider range of queries

The AI-assisted easy filter (first released in 2502) enables you to filter list reports in your SAP Fiori elements-based apps using natural language. This simplifies how you access the information you need and reduces the training time required to pick up new applications delivered by SAP.

AI-assisted easy filter enables natural language filtering of pages with lists of business objects. Here the user can filter for a given sold-to party using plain language rather than needing to know its key..

For 2508, we’ve made a number of enhancements to make interactions with AI-assisted easy filter even more intuitive:

  1. Tables can be filtered without needing to know an object’s specific key. Instead, simply enter the name of the object you are looking for. The AI-assisted easy filter will map that text to the intended key and apply it to the filter fields for you, which is a much more natural way to search for information. In the event that there are multiple keys with similar names, you will receive results filtered for those names. As before, you can always refine your results in the input field or using the classic filtering.
  2. We’ve also worked to ensure parity between the filter fields that can be applied using the AI-assisted easy filter and the classic filter bar. Some users had reported that, in some cases, AI-assisted easy filter would not apply queries to certain filters. This was caused by the fact that some of the filter fields used navigation paths to different entities instead of the main entity for the app. This scenario is now supported and you can filter on any property present in the classic filter bar.

My Home Personalization with Insights Cards supports more apps and a new way to query for cards

The ability to create Insights cards and quickly add them to My Home now supports 20 SAP Fiori apps.

AI-assisted smart personalization of My Home for Insights cards was released as a Joule capability as part of its 2503 release. The functionality allows end users to query Joule for business data they regularly need using natural language. The output is displayed as a card that can be added to their My Home page for easy reference. This makes it easier for users to access information they need to make everyday business decisions and move processes forward.

This functionality was initially limited to 9 applications. With the 2508 release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, this coverage has been extended to 11 additional applications. This gives users easier and wider access to the business data that is important to them. AI-assisted smart personalization of My Home for Insights cards now supports the following applications:

  1. Find Maintenance Order
  2. Find Maintenance Order and Operation
  3. Maintain Bill Of Material
  4. Manage Business Partner Master Data
  5. Manage Customer Returns
  6. Manage Manual Reservations
  7. Manage Material Coverage (Version 2)
  8. Manage Outbound Deliveries
  9. Manage Product Master Data
  10. Manage Purchase Orders (Version 2)
  11. Manage Purchase Requisitions - Professional
  12. Manage Sales Orders
  13. Manage Sales Orders - Version 2
  14. Manage Sales Quotation - Version 2
  15. Manage Supplier Master Data
  16. Manage Usage Decisions
  17. Material Documents Overview
  18. Project Control - Enterprise Projects
  19. Reproceess Failed Material Movements
  20. Supplier Invoices List (Version 2)

Users can now use natural language to create and add Insights Cards directly in My Home.

For the 2508 release, we have also introduced a new way to create Insights cards using natural language: you can access the feature directly from My Home. This gives users the flexibility to choose the personalization option that works best for them, giving them access to the information they need at a glance.

If you'd like to read even more exciting updates about features and functionality included in the 2508 release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, check out the following fantastic blogs from my colleagues:

  • For a general overview of new functionality: Highlights of the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 release 
  • For a few more AI uses cases, some focused on particular business processes: Exploring AI and next-gen Cloud ERP innovations in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 

Commercialization update: New Base AI includes common AI functions at no additional cost

For the 2508 release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, a number of AI solutions have been added to its Base AI offering. This means that you can use the features absolutely free of charge. You simply need to sign the SAP AI terms here and SAP will handle the activation for you.

Included in the Base AI offering for this release are AI-assisted easy filter and AI-assisted smart summarization, as well as AI-assisted enterprise search (which allows you to look up data from the search in My Home). Give them a try!

Try out upcoming AI innovations in the 2508 beta

For customers looking to try out the absolute latest in AI innovations, registration for the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition beta is still open. This is your opportunity to try out and give feedback on new use cases for AI in your system. The solutions up for beta testing are free to use for the duration of the program.  Below is a preview of some of the features that will be available. Please note: Customer/partner participation will be at the discretion of the Beta Testing Program team. Participants must use SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition productively. Future developments are at the discretion of SAP and their details and delivery dates may be changed at any time.

Resolve situations directly in My Home without navigating to applications

AI-assisted smart solution for situations in My Home allows you to quickly take action on business processes that need your attention directly in My Home..

The Situations tab in My Home provides quick summaries of business processes that need to be addressed in your system. Previously, this meant reading the alert on the tile, navigating to the required app(s), and making the required changes. With AI-assisted Smart Solution for Situations in My Home, we’re streamlining how you take action on these scenarios. You’ll now be able to see a summary of the situation, start the relevant business process from quick actions on the card, and even make changes to the business data all without leaving your My Home page. This allows you to stay on top of your business and resolve potential issues even faster.

Streamline data entry in object pages

AI-assisted easy fill streamlines data entry by populating object pages based on natural language input (for example: emails or messages from colleagues).

Depending on your business scenario, SAP Fiori object pages can sometimes be quite complex. Data entry might mean filling a field at the top of the screen, scrolling for several sections to add more information, and so on. AI-assisted easy fill enables you to enter your updates into a single field using natural language. The solution then maps your input to the proper fields, highlights any potential inconsistencies that may need to be addressed, and – after your review – updates the fields. This will help speed up data entry and reduce training time for new users.

Resolve error messages with AI assistance

AI-assisted error explanation provides resolution recommendations to error and warning messages in your system.

Learning new business processes can be tricky. AI-assisted error explanation uses AI to generate explanations and suggest resolutions for errors that are triggered in your system. This streamlines how you handle errors and reduces training time, making you more productive and helping you pick up processes even faster; in addition to reducing your organization’s support load.

Search for applications you need using natural language

AI-assisted smart personalization of My Home for applications allows you to search for applications using natural language.

When learning a new business process or stepping into a new role, it can sometimes be challenging to find the exact application you need to carry out a task. With AI-assisted smart personalization of My Home for applications, you can search for the app you need using natural language. Simply type in what you need to do and get served the required application, which you can add to your My Home page with a single click. This allows you to access the applications you need without needing to know the exact application name.

We want to hear from you!

Whether you take advantage of the new free features in the Base AI package, subscribe to cutting edge technologies, or choose to take part in a beta program; we want to hear what you think about these solutions! Give them a try and share your feedback below or with the product team. Your experience is critical to understanding how we can make these innovations even better for you.

When you’re ready to get involved, you can:

  1. Register to use base AI features
  2. Sign up for the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition beta
  3. Join the Public Cloud Practitioner Forum (for customers live on SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition)

Happy experimenting! We’ll be back with another update for the 2602 release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.
